naslov: Villa for rent nearby town of Split***LONG TERM LEASE (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Ova novorenovirana villa je smjestena u podnozju planine Mosor, nedaleko od grada Split, udaljeno svega 10 km. Samostojeci objekt ukupne stambene povrsine 280 m2 koji se proteze na nekoliko razina pocevsi od podruma gdje je smjesten gym te vlastiti spa centar s saunom i jacuzzijem zasigurno ce naci svoje poklonike u svakodnevnom opustanju od dnevnih obveza i uzurbanog stila zivota. Potpuno opremljene dvije spavace sobe svaka sa svojom kupaonicom su smjestene na katu dok se treca nalazi na medukatu kao gostinjska soba takoder s kupaonicom. U samom prizemlju se nalazi open space dnevni dio  s blagovaonicom gdje dominira sjedeca garnitura iz koje se pruza pogled na bazen, staklene stjenke duz cijelog zida omogucavaju dnevno svjetlo i prozracnost tijekom cijelog dana sto ovu vilu cine vrlo ugodnom za zivljenje. Kultivirana okucnica s Mediteranskim biljem te  potpuno opremljena ljetna kuhinja s kaminom gdje cete uzivati u opustenim vecernjim druzenjima uz bazen su samo dio sadrzaja koji vam ova villa nudi! Sve daljnje informacije na dolje navedeni kontakt. Ag. provizija jedna  mjesečna najamnina + PDV Agencija Ketrin Real Estate 095 85 22 300, 095 523 17 88 mail: operations@ketrinrealestate.com Naša tvrtka posjeduje certifikat sustava upravljanja kvalitetom ISO 9001:2015 ______________________________________________________________ Newly renovated villa is located above the Mosor Mountains, only 10 km away from the city of Split. Semi detached house with a total living area of ​​280 sqm, spanning on several levels starting from the basement where gym and spa center are located and its own sauna and jacuzzi which will surely find its devotees in daily relaxation from daily commitments and busy lifestyle. Fully equipped two en suite bedrooms are located on upper floor, while the third en suite bedroom is located on the mezzanine serving as guest room. Ground floor consists of open space living area, dining area dominated by seating furniture with the view on the pool through glass walls which  provide daylight and transparency throughout the day, making this villa very comfortable to live in. A cultivated garden with Mediterranean plants and a fully equipped summer kitchen with a fireplace where you can enjoy relaxing evenings by the pool are just some of the amenities this villa has to offer! Any further information to the contact below.
